front.title: Traffic Steering using BGP Flowspec with SRv6 Policy

abstract.t: BGP Flow Specification (FlowSpec) [I-D.ietf-idr-rfc5575bis] has been proposed to distribute BGP FlowSpec NLRI to FlowSpec clients to mitigate (distributed) denial-of-service attacks, and to provide traffic filtering in the context of a BGP/MPLS VPN service. Recently, traffic steering applications in the context of SRv6 using FlowSpec aslo attract attention. This document introduces the usage of BGP FlowSpec to steer packets into an SRv6 Policy.
